name: Adagio (itch)
description:
In Adagio, you will jump and push yourself using grapples to collect coins and reach the goal to pass to the nex Level

A little story

This is my first game ever and I want to create more games, but first, I'm want to create a team with all the equipment that we need to develope a game with molded characters and awesome fields disegn.

Also, I wanna pay my electrical bill that is really expensive :)

Thank you for your help and enjoy my game
